name: Pulse (itch) (daancode)
description:
You play as a detached human consciousness - controlling the "Pulse" gets your characters to make simple decisions, often not without overwhelming consequences.

Simple, single-button control scheme (just use Spacebar for every interaction).

High value of Puls brings your character into more risky, emotion-based decisions while low amounts result in steering towards more rational approach.

This game has been made at HGJ2018 (Huuuge Game Jam 2018) and we think it greatly illustrates the theme which is "Butterfly Effect".

This build is for demo purposes only and does not contain full implementation of all of the possible endings.

Please mind all the instabillities, crashes and lack of some content.
